nodes.text: The Waker's Dance was a dance performed by Twi'leks as part of the Festival of Awakening. In 3644 BBY Nalen Raloch did the dance with the rest of the Twi'lek settlers in the Kalikori village on Tython.
Waker's Dance is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Consular class mission on Tython.
